entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
